title: I play this game too much.
body:
Do I continue my journey on getting more m7 champs? or just play one champ and get gud?

I have been playing different champs and sticking to them until I get m7 and its been fun but i think im ready to just settle down for a while, 
but who do I play?? 

Leave a suggestion pls.

- Gnarchos.

screenshots of profile (OCE)

https://puu.sh/rqzTT/ea6a72cd23.png

https://puu.sh/rqzP3/2f0a824f50.png

replies.body:
mf, jhin & ezreal would be good for ranked
gnar, yas, vayne & thresh would be good if you want to keep sticking to them
you're pretty amazing...i struggle to even get 1 champ to lvl 5 ._.

I agree with the MF, she's actually insane for SoloQ! The flat armor pen build is bonkers

Also a sneaky heads up, Jayce is about to be quite popular (thanks Worlds)!

I haven't heard the word "Bonkers" lately, or "Jayce" for that matter

haha
Woody! shhh !!!! don't tell people about the cheese armour pen strat >.< it's a secret!!!!!
What ever you have fun the most doing, do that
Pfffttttt when you carry as support is when you play too much! http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/y3y9Hcgn-aram-team-serious-aram-players-only?comment=0009
Play all the champs and git gud.

do quinn buddy.

i only just started playing her recently and am striving for mastery 7 quinn now. i love that fucking ult.
